title: Strategy and Operations Analyst (Immediate Joiner)
description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Strategy and Operations Analyst to join our

team. In this role, you will play a critical role in supporting strategic decision-making across the

technology organization. You will be responsible for analyzing business performance, identifying

opportunities for growth and efficiency, analyzing data, and supporting the implementation of key

strategic initiatives. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement

data-driven solutions that drive business success. This is an excellent opportunity for a highly

analytical and results-oriented individual to make a significant impact on the company's success.




Key Responsibilities:




Strategic Analysis

• Ability to think strategically and identify innovative solutions to complex business

challenges

• Support strategic planning processes, including the development of annual operating plans

and long-term strategic plans

• Conduct in-depth analysis to identify trends and opportunities

• Provide insights to inform strategic planning and decision-making processes

Operational Improvement and Excellence

• Analyze operational data to identify areas for improvement in efficiency and effectiveness

• Evaluate existing operational processes and recommend improvements

• Support the implementation of new processes, tools, and technologies

• Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and track progress towards goals

Project Management

• Manage and execute special projects as assigned, ensuring timely and successful

completion

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project alignment and success

• Ensure project timelines and objectives are met

Data Analysis

• Develop insightful dashboards and reports to track key metrics and communicate findings

to stakeholders

• Proficient in data analysis and leveraging visualization tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau,

Power BI)

Stakeholder Collaboration

• Partner with teams across departments to align strategy and operations with business goals

• Present findings and recommendations to senior leadership and other stakeholders




Qualifications:




• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Economics, Engineering, Finance, or a

related technical or analytical field

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to analyze data and draw

meaningful conclusions

• Proficiency in Excel, PowerPoint, and data analysis tools

• Excellent communication and presentation skills with the ability to effectively

communicate complex information

• Strong project management and organizational skills

• Detail-oriented and results-oriented with a strong work ethic

Skills:

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on data interpretation and

decision-making

• Excellent communication and presentation skills

• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
